content:
Hi there,

I wonder what happened to -Cno-integrated-as option? The only thing I could find is https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/70345.

However, I need this option to switch to GNU as on some mipsel devices that have issues withll/sc which LLVM as does not currently provide a fix.

Is there any way to use it on a stable channel Rust compiler? If not, is there any suggestion on how to restore this functionality?

Thanks
probably a bad idea: using --emit to generate the asm and then running your preferred assembler over that? :^)
